item.title: Maven Wiki
item.description: Maven Resources Apache Maven Docs: Maven CLI Options Reference Apache Maven Docs: Maven CI Friendly Versions Apache Maven Docs: Maven Plugins Difference b/t Common Maven Plugins Maven Commands To view the versions of every dependency used throughout your maven project: 1 mvn dependency:tree Maven Build Lifecycle Quick Summary of Maven Build Lifecycle from the Apache Website Clean clean is it’s own build lifecycle phase (which can be thought of as an action or task) in Maven.

item.title: Spring Boot
item.description: Links to each Spring project Spring Data JPA JPQL Docs - Apache Spring Data JPA Official Docs Sorting With Spring Data Baeldung: Sorting Query Results with Spring Data Baeldung: Pagination and Sorting Dynamic sorting with the Spring Data Sort object: A replacement for the ORDER BY clause used in classic SQL Implementation Guides and Tutorials Baeldung: @Query Medium: Pagination example queries in JPQL Baeldung: Transaction Management Wildcard Queries Baeldung: Setting up MetaModel JPA Specifications - Interactive Tutorial JPA Specifications - Interactive Tutorial Hibernate docs - JPA MetaModel Helpful Stack Overflow Posts Difference Between Criteria, Predicate and Specification Criteria API vs QueryDSL vs JPA MetaModel JPA Specifications Spring Boot Actuator Management Endpoints Spring Boot Actuator Endpoints Documentation A useful tutorial for Spring Boot Actuator jEnv For easily managing Java versions across projects Custom Banner in Spring Boot In short, just create a /src/main/resources/banner.
